Package is.merkor.core

A package containing the core data and dictionary interfaces for access to MerkOr data.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Cluster An interface for implementations of Clusters.
ClusterDictionary An interface for the access of Clusters.
ClusterMember An interface for implementations of clusterMembers.
ClusterMemberDictionary An interface for the access of ClusterMembers.
HierarchicalCluster An interface for implementations of HierarchicalClusters.
HierarchicalClusterDictionary An interface for the access of HierarchicalClusters.
Item An interface for implementations of lexical items.
ItemDictionary An interface for the access of Items.
Pair An interface for implementations of item pairs.
Relation An interface for implementations of relations.
RelationDictionary An interface for the access of Relations.
RelationType An interface for implementations of relationType.
 

Class Summary
RelationObject A wrapper class for an Item connected with a list of Relations.
 

Package is.merkor.core Description

A package containing the core data and dictionary interfaces for access to MerkOr data.
